metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Cashguard| - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Guard_08 e4ff4283-9c1c-4fd7-8e7c-b7fa27b789a8 - (-117; 1; -292)

0.speaker: Cashguard Galleass
0.text: Only the Head Banker can accompany you down to the vaults, I'm afraid. I'm sure he'll be back shortly.

1.speaker: Cashguard Galleass
1.text: May Waukeen shift the scales in your favour.
